## XhtmlFieldDefinition type

Represents an XHTML field (a.k.a. Format Area) definition (in a Schema).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type XhtmlFieldDefinition = TextFieldDefinition & {
    DefaultValue?: string;
    FormattingFeatures?: FormattingFeatures;
    Height?: number;
};
```
